price: ហើយពិតប្រាកដណាស់ ម្ចាស់របស់អ្នកដឹងនូវអ្វីដែលចិត្ដ របស់ពួកគេលាក់បាំងនិងអ្វីដែលពួកគេលាតត្រដាង។
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka yaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
